title: Amazon slashes up to 50% off Beats Studio Pro headphones, Studio Buds earbuds
description: Amazon's steeper Beats deals deliver price cuts of up to 50% off over-ear headphones and earbuds.Save up to 50% on Beats headphones.On the heels of the Powerbeats Pro 2 launch, Amazon has issued fresh price drops on other models from the Beats line, including Studio Pro over-ear headphones.Grab Beat deals Continue Reading on AppleInsider | Discuss on our Forums
author: Christine McKee
excerpt: Amazon's steeper Beats deals deliver price cuts of up to 50% off over-ear headphones and earbuds.
text: Amazon's steeper Beats deals deliver price cuts of up to 50% off over-ear headphones and earbuds. On the heels of the Powerbeats Pro 2 launch, Amazon has issued fresh price drops on other models from the Beats line, including Studio Pro over-ear headphones. Grab Beat deals Prices for the wireless Bluetooth headphones with ANC have dipped to $179.99 in select colorways. You can also pick up Studio Buds for $99.99 and Studio Buds Plus for $119.99. These limited-time Beats deals sit alongside price reductions on Apple's AirPods range, with sale prices as low as $119. Beats price drops Beats Studio Pro: $179.99 ($170 off) Beats Studio Buds Plus: $119.99 ($50 off) Beats Studio Buds: $99.95 ($50 off) AirPods sale AirPods Pro 2 with USB-C: $199 ($50 off) AirPods 4 without ANC: $119 ($10 off) AirPods 4 with ANC: $148.99 ($31 off) AirPods Max Over-Ear Headphones (USB-C): $479.99 ($70 off) Check out our AirPods & Beats deals roundup for the latest markdowns on Apple headphones.
html:
Amazon's steeper Beats deals deliver price cuts of up to 50% off over-ear headphones and earbuds.

On the heels of the Powerbeats Pro 2 launch, Amazon has issued fresh price drops on other models from the Beats line, including Studio Pro over-ear headphones.

Grab Beat deals

Prices for the wireless Bluetooth headphones with ANC have dipped to $179.99 in select colorways. You can also pick up Studio Buds for $99.99 and Studio Buds Plus for $119.99. These limited-time Beats deals sit alongside price reductions on Apple's AirPods range, with sale prices as low as $119.

Beats price drops

  • Beats Studio Pro: $179.99 ($170 off)
  • Beats Studio Buds Plus: $119.99 ($50 off)
  • Beats Studio Buds: $99.95 ($50 off)

AirPods sale

  • AirPods Pro 2 with USB-C: $199 ($50 off)
  • AirPods 4 without ANC: $119 ($10 off)
  • AirPods 4 with ANC: $148.99 ($31 off)
  • AirPods Max Over-Ear Headphones (USB-C): $479.99 ($70 off)

Check out our AirPods & Beats deals roundup for the latest markdowns on Apple headphones.
